title: ERROR  You have encountered an error. Please try again later.
body: Whenever I try to buy rp with mobile payment this error comes up {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} , is this happening to anyone else

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're still experiencing this error I recommend [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for further assistance as this is more than likely related to something on bokus end or relating to your account.
Yes I have it too it's very annoying
